Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 26th overall pick, by Minnesota in 1972...
Traded from Minnesota to San Francisco on 7/14/1977 (Going to SF: P D. Lewallyn, P M. Fidrych, SS R. Washington, LF L. Fritz, LF M. Rivers. Going to MIN: 1B B. Robertson)...
Injured on 7/20/1978 with a Ruptured Elbow Ligament, out for 4 weeks...
Earned first career win on 4/3/1979...
Injured on 4/27/1979 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Injured on 5/8/1979 with a Strained Back, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/28/1979, winning 2 games with a 1.62 ERA...
Injured on 9/15/1979 with a Pulled Bicep Tendon, out for 3 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/15/1980, winning 2 games with a 0.53 ERA...
Injured on 4/15/1981 with a Inflamed Bicep Tendon, out for 3-4 weeks...
Won Gold Glove Award at Pitcher in 1981...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/23/1982, winning 2 games with a 0.50 ERA...
Injured on 9/16/1983 with a Pulled Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 2-3 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/23/1985, winning 2 games with a 0.52 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/1985, going 5-1, 1.94...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
Injured on 9/8/1986 with a Tender Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 9/21/1986 with a Hyper Extended Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Injured on 9/26/1987 with a Torn Tricep Muscle, out for full season...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
Won Gold Glove Award at Pitcher in 1989...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/12/1990, winning 2 games with a 0.50 ERA...
Signed as a free agent by New York (N) on 2/4/1991 to a 1-year deal worth $400,000 per year...
